author: Bloomberg
title: Goldman sees recession in India as consumption takes severe hit
description: The virus pandemic has brought “an unprecedented sudden stop” to activity in India.
content:
By Abhishek VishnoiIndia’s economy will likely contract in the first two quarters of the year as consumption plunges during a three-week lockdown to contain the coronavirus outbreak, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
